title: SoTL-Based Online Practical Course for Strengthening Public Administration Leadership Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Learners, as ordinary citizens, demand practical problem-solving competencies for community issues, aiming to acquire field-applicable knowledge through real-time discussions and case analyses

learning_goals: Learners can explain instructional design principles by analyzing public administration cases applying SoTL methodologies
Learners can design and present public problem-solving projects using digital collaboration tools
Learners can practice data-driven decision-making strategies for improving administrative processes in simulated environments
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
